Documentation: github.com/haraldrudell/parl/parlfs

     7  
     8  package parlfs
     9  
    10  import (
    11  	"os"
    12  	"path/filepath"
    13  	"strconv"
    14  	"testing"
    15  )
    16  
    17  const (
    18  	userPerm   os.FileMode = 0700
    19  	uniqueName             = "TestWalkSym"
    20  	rootName               = "root"
    21  	root2Name              = "root2"
    22  	dirName                = "dir"
    23  	dir2Name               = "dir2"
    24  	targetName             = "target"
    25  	symName                = "sym"
    26  	file1Name              = "file1"
    27  	file2Name              = "file2"
    28  )
    29  
    30  func TestWalkSym(t *testing.T) {
    31  	/*
    32  		symlink test cases:
    33  		1. repeated symlink makes no difference
    34  		2. symlink to separate root
    35  		3. symlink to parent
    36  		4. symlink to root subdirectory
    37  
    38  		./root/sym1 -> ./root2/dir2
    39  		./root/sym2 -> ./root2/dir2
    40  		./root/sym3 -> ./root/dir
    41  		./root/dir/file1
    42  
    43  		./root2/dir2/sym4 -> ./root2
    44  		./root2/dir2/file2
    45  	*/
    46  	uniqueDir := filepath.Join(os.TempDir(), uniqueName)
    47  	root := filepath.Join(uniqueDir, rootName)
    48  	//panic(errors.New(uniqueDir))
    49  	dir := filepath.Join(uniqueDir, rootName, dirName)
    50  	dir2 := filepath.Join(uniqueDir, root2Name, dir2Name)
    51  	for _, d := range []string{dir, dir2} {
    52  		if err := os.MkdirAll(d, userPerm); err != nil {
    53  			t.Logf("os.MkdirAll failed: %s\n", d)
    54  			panic(err)
    55  		}
    56  	}
    57  	for _, f := range []string{filepath.Join(dir, file1Name), filepath.Join(dir2, file2Name)} {
    58  		file, err := os.Create(f)
    59  		if err != nil {
    60  			t.Logf("os.Create failed: %s\n", f)
    61  			panic(err)
    62  		}
    63  		if err := file.Close(); err != nil {
    64  			t.Logf("file.Close failed: %s\n", f)
    65  			panic(err)
    66  		}
    67  	}
    68  	oldnames := []string{
    69  		filepath.Join(uniqueDir, root2Name, dir2Name),
    70  		filepath.Join(uniqueDir, root2Name, dir2Name),
    71  		filepath.Join(uniqueDir, rootName, dirName),
    72  		filepath.Join(uniqueDir, root2Name),
    73  	}
    74  	for i := 0; i < 4; i++ {
    75  		n := i + 1
    76  		oldname := oldnames[i]
    77  		newname := filepath.Join(uniqueDir, rootName, symName+strconv.Itoa(n))
    78  		if n == 4 {
    79  			newname = filepath.Join(uniqueDir, root2Name, dir2Name, symName+strconv.Itoa(n))
    80  		}
    81  		if err := os.Symlink(oldname, newname); err != nil && !os.IsExist(err) {
    82  			t.Logf("os.Symlink failed: oldname: %s newname: %s\n", oldname, newname)
    83  			panic(err)
    84  		}
    85  	}
    86  	t.Logf("Directory: %s\n", uniqueDir)
    87  
    88  	// WalkFunc
    89  	var _ filepath.WalkFunc
    90  	walkFn := func(path string, info os.FileInfo, err error) error {
    91  		t.Log(path)
    92  		return err
    93  	}
    94  
    95  	// filepath.Walk
    96  	t.Log("filepath.Walk:")
    97  	if err := filepath.Walk(root, walkFn); err != nil {
    98  		t.Log("filepath.Walk failed")
    99  		panic(err)
   100  	}
   101  
   102  	/*
   103  		_ = symwalk.Walk
   104  	*/
   105  	/*
   106  		// symwalk.Walk
   107  		t.Log("symwalk.Walk:")
   108  		if err := symwalk.Walk(root, walkFn); err != nil { // github.com/facebookgo/symwalk
   109  			t.Log("symwalk.Walk failed")
   110  			panic(err)
   111  		}
   112  	*/
   113  	// parlfs.Walk
   114  	t.Log("parlfs.Walk:")
   115  	if err := Walk(root, walkFn); err != nil {
   116  		t.Log("parlfs.Walk failed")
   117  		panic(err)
   118  	}
   119  }
   120  

Build version go1.17.8.
